show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Today’s guest is Ronald W. Light, editor and author of The Risks of Prescription Drugs. <!--more--> Unless you are a world class expert on pharmaceutical companies, the FDA, and the drug approval process—this will be an incredibly enlightening hour.
In fact, even the experts should learn from this analysis of medication risks associated with psychiatric and non-psychiatric drugs.
Dr Light will also join me in a special presentation at our upcoming Empathic Therapy Conference, April 8-10 in Syracuse New York (www.empathictherapy.
org).
